caption: The video starts with a conversation between two women who seem to work in an office, possibly a law firm. While organizing files, they compare a photo from the file to a real-life photo of a man who might be a fugitive. By nightfall, a man approaches one of the women while she's walking her dog. It seems he's trying to obtain some information from her. At first, she appears reluctant, but eventually, she seems to give in. The scene then shifts to the address of the man in the photo. A bald man has already located him, and an intense gunfight ensues between their parties.
